name: Passout
description:
Passout is a drinking game for adults.
Passout is not a game of skill or strategy, it is a game of chance that can be played by 2-6 players.
Passout is played by passing the device to each player in turn for them to complete their counter by randomly selecting a coloured disc from the Passout bag.
Every time a counter of their colour is selected they must take a drink.
Remember to drink responsibly.
www.drinkaware.co.uk
